amendment.description: To include certain provisions relating to Federal Energy Regulatory Commission hydroelectric projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3059 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3059 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4333) To include certain provisions relating to Federal Energy Regulatory Commission hydroelectric projects.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3059 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3059 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2910.
